original_title: 5th SL Army contingent ready to serve UN
original_body_lines: The 5th Combat Convoy Company (CCC) is now ready to undertake UN Peacekeeping Mission responsibilities in the United Nations Multi-dimensional Integrated Stabilization Mission in Mali (MINUSMA). Prior to their departure from the country, presented a ceremonial salute to Lt. General Vikum Liyanage RWP RSP NDU, Commander of the Army at the Regimental Headquarters parade ground of Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) at Ambepussa on Friday (23).
